message: Fair 60-40 split. Accept and we both win!
Let's split 55-45.  It's important to reach a deal quickly and this feels fair given the circumstances.
Counteroffer. 58-42 is as low as I'm willing to go for now.
Time is running out! This offer gets us both a good amount. Let's close the deal.
Still not low enough, Bob. Meet me in the middle.
Alice, let's be real. I'm proposing a 50/50 split. This is the definition of fair and avoids us both losing everything. Take the deal!
